title: How to Make a Sauce for Dolmas

steps.headline: Bring the yogurt down to room temperature.
Chop some cilantro or mint leaves finely.
Combine the prepared ingredients well and finally, add the salt.
Use as a sauce for the prepared filling of the Dolmades.
Separate the egg whites from the yolk.
Beat the egg yolks until thick and lemony.
Add some lemon juice and combine.
Combine the butter, flour, salt and milk over the flame.
Keep stirring for 5-6 minutes or until it reaches your desired consistency.

text: Yogurt with Vegetables Bring the yogurt down to room temperature.  Grate or mince the cucumber.  Peel and grate the carrot.  Mince the onion.  Crush the garlic.  Chop some cilantro or mint leaves finely.  Combine the prepared ingredients well and finally, add the salt.  Use as a sauce for the prepared filling of the Dolmades.  Egg and Lemon Separate the egg whites from the yolk.  Beat the egg yolks until thick and lemony.  Add some lemon juice and combine.  White Sauce Combine the butter, flour, salt and milk over the flame.  Keep stirring for 5-6 minutes or until it reaches your desired consistency.
